mapper.select: SELECT book_no,title,author,publisher,TO_CHAR(pubdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as pubdate, description, price, image, cate_no from book

SELECT book.book_no,title,author,publisher,TO_CHAR(pubdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as pubdate, description, price, image, th_image, cate_no,stock from book,stock where book.book_no = #{book_no} AND book.book_no = stock.book_no
mapper.update: update book set title = #{title}, author = #{author}, publisher = #{publisher}, pubdate = to_date(#{pubdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), price = #{price}, description = #{description}, image = #{image}, th_image = #{th_image}, cate_no = #{cate_no} where book_no = #{book_no}
mapper.insert: insert into book (book_no, title, author, publisher, pubdate, description, image, price, cate_no, th_image) values (seq_book_no.nextval, #{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, sysdate, #{description}, #{image}, #{price}, #{cate_no}, #{th_image})
mapper.select: SELECT book_no,title,author,publisher,TO_CHAR(pubdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as pubdate, description, price, image, cate_no FROM book WHERE ROWNUM<=18 ORDER BY book_no
SELECT book_no,title,author,publisher,TO_CHAR(pubdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as pubdate, description, price, image, cate_no FROM book WHERE cate_no=#{cate_no} AND ROWNUM<=12 ORDER BY book_no

SELECT rnum,book_no,title,author,publisher,pubdate,description, price, image, cate_no FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum,book_no,title,author,publisher,pubdate,description, price, image, cate_no FROM ( SELECT book_no,title,author,publisher,TO_CHAR(pubdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as pubdate ,description, price, image, cate_no FROM book
ORDER BY book_no DESC ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
